intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are comparing insurance providers or renewing policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to showcase cost-saving calculators or personalized recommendations.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded tools.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intents.user_motivation: Users want to decode complex insurance jargon to make informed decisions.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or exploring policy options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Simplify complex terms using ING’s trusted brand voice and expertise.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Glossary-style content with examples and visuals.

intents.sub_intent: mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid common pitfalls that could cost them money or coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this after a negative experience or when filing a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide a checklist or guide to help users navigate claims and avoid errors.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to find the best coverage for their needs and budget.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing policies or making a purchase decision.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING’s expertise in personalized insurance solutions.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can emphasize its digital tools and European expertise to offer unique cost-saving insights.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive cost-saving hub with calculators, tips, and case studies.

sub_intents: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING’s trusted reputation can simplify complex topics for users.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop an educational series with videos, infographics, and FAQs.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums

mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
quick_wins: Create a listicle on cost-saving tips.
Develop a glossary of insurance terms with examples.
Publish a checklist for avoiding insurance claim mistakes.
strategic_priorities: Invest in interactive tools like premium calculators.
